items.sentence: Why didn't you tell me you weren't going to do that?
I'll go to Boston next month with one of my friends.
What answer did you come up with for question three?
Do you believe I have a chance to get that position?
What kinds of plants are you growing in your garden?
Novels aren't being read as much as they used to be.
The traffic was heavy so I was late for the meeting.
What persuaded you to accept this unusual challenge?
Let some fresh air into the room every now and then.
I suspect that Tom wasn't the only one who did that.
I know Tom will always help me when I need his help.
Tom and Mary haven't seen each other in a long time.
I've been in the hospital for the past three months.
Do you know those ladies who just got off the train?
Tom deserves to be paid more than he's getting paid.
I found a place to rent not too far from the campus.
I don't think that Tom could do this as well as you.
I only bought about half the things I needed to buy.
I tell people all the time that they should do that.
Didn't you know Tom and Mary often do that together?
